attributes.action: Protection of the individual before decection of the criminal -no to a DNA database
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you want a Police force that will protect you from muggers, rapists, murderers and louts rather than use a DNA database to catch your killer then sign up.
The DNA database is about improving clear-up rates but is no protection against ANY criminal.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
